metadata.title: CVE-2012-3458 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Beaker before 1.6.4, when using PyCrypto to encrypt sessions, uses AES inECB cipher mode, which might allow remote attackers to obtain portions ofsensitive session data via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3458` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-beaker - 1.6.4
python3-beaker - 1.6.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: beaker package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.4').
